nodes.text: Nict was a Human admiral serving the Galactic Alliance in 130 ABY. He was present at the Battle of Caamas, and was an old friend of Admiral Gar Stazi. He was apparently killed at the battle when his flagship, the Pride of Corellia, was destroyed while the fleet was attempting to escape to hyperspace.
The character was named by John Ostrander after the Jedi Council Forums user AdmiralNick22, an enthusiastic fan of the Galactic Alliance.
